titles.title: Exemplary Breastfeeding Support Act
A bill to amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to promote and support breastfeeding through the special supplemental nutrition program for women, infants, and children.
Exemplary Breastfeeding Support Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Exemplary Breastfeeding Support Act - Amends the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to implement programs in support of breastfeeding in the special supplemental nutrition program for women, infants, and children (WIC).
